subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With a 20-point rout of the Kings at Barclays Center, the Nets moved to 5-1 under Coach P. J. Carlesimo and finally appear headed in the right direction.
snippet: With a 20-point rout of the Kings at Barclays Center, the Nets moved to 5-1 under Coach P. J. Carlesimo and finally appear headed in the right direction.
